item.title: 台湾雅歌计划将芝浦的人工智能技术留在日本
item.description: 台湾雅歌公司（Yageo Corp）表示，如果成功收购芝浦电子公司（Shibaura Electronics Co.【原文：Taiwan’s Yageo Corp. said it would keep Shibaura Electronics Co.’s most advanced technology in Japan if it successfully acquires the artificial intelligence sensor maker.】

item.title: 中国央行连续第七个月扩大黄金购买规模
item.description: 中国央行 5 月份连续第七个月扩大黄金储备，在价格持续波动的情况下进一步实现了持有黄金的多样化。【原文：China’s central bank expanded its gold reserves for a seventh straight month in May, furthering its bid to diversify holdings despite ongoing price fluctuations.】

item.title: 澳大利亚金融时报》称力拓希望为澳大利亚铝冶炼厂提供救助
item.description: 据《澳大利亚金融评论报》报道，由于能源成本飙升，力拓集团正在为其托马戈铝冶炼厂（澳大利亚最大的电力用户）寻求数十亿美元的政府救助。【原文：Rio Tinto Group is seeking a multibillion-dollar government bailout for its Tomago aluminum smelter — Australia’s largest electricity user — due to spiraling energy costs, the Australian Financial Review reported.】

item.title: 台湾官员在阿拉斯加峰会上讨论美国能源合作问题
item.description: 本周在阿拉斯加举行的一次峰会上，台湾最高总统助理与美国官员讨论了能源合作问题。【原文：Taiwan’s top presidential aide discussed energy cooperation with US officials at a summit this week in Alaska, where a liquefied natural gas project has come into focus for potential exporting to the island.】

item.title: 日本不必等待七国集团峰会达成美国贸易协议
item.description: 日本最高谈判代表赤泽亮世周五在华盛顿表示，如果双方能提前达成一致，日本不一定要等到下周在加拿大举行的七国集团峰会上才能与美国达成贸易协议。【原文：Japan won’t necessarily wait for the Group of Seven Summit set to take place in Canada next week to seal a trade deal with the US if the two sides can agree earlier, Japan’s top negotiator Ryosei Akazawa said in Washington DC on Friday.】

item.title: 韩国称特朗普同意与李在镕加强关税谈判
item.description: 在美国领导人对其亚洲盟友的所有进口产品征收 25% 的关税之后，韩国表示，新当选的总统李在明首次与唐纳德-特朗普进行了会谈，并同意在贸易谈判中寻求 "切实的成果"。【原文：South Korea said newly elected President Lee Jae-myung spoke for the first time with Donald Trump and agreed to seek “tangible results” in trade negotiations, after the US leader imposed a 25% tariff on all imports from its Asian ally.】

item.title: S&P 道琼斯公司在季度调整中未对 S&P 500 指数作出任何变动
item.description: 据 S&P Dow Jones Indices 公司发言人称，该公司在周五进行的最新一轮季度再平衡中没有改变 S&P 500 指数的成员资格。【原文：S&P Dow Jones Indices left membership in the S&P 500 unchanged in its latest round of quarterly rebalancing on Friday, according to a company spokesperson.】

item.title: 财政部长发出哥伦比亚将暂停实施财政规则的信号
item.description: 哥伦比亚财政部长格尔曼-阿维拉（German Avila）表示，该国将暂停财政锚，并呼吁大幅降息。【原文：Colombian Finance Minister German Avila signaled that the nation will suspend its fiscal anchor and also called for substantial interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 预算困境持续，惠誉将奥地利评级降至历史新低
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）首次将奥地利的主权信用评级下调至低于最高评级两级，使奥地利政府在修复国家财政的努力中再次受挫。【原文：Austria’s sovereign credit was cut by Fitch Ratings to two steps below the top mark for the first time, handing the government another setback in its bid to repair the country’s finances.】

item.title: 特朗普加密钱包之争以世界自由基金会购买 Memecoin 结束
item.description: 埃里克-特朗普（Eric Trump）表示，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的加密货币帝国中各竞争派系之间的紧张关系已经降温，其家族的世界自由金融公司（World Liberty Financial）将购买 "大量 "处于争端中心的memecoin。【原文：Eric Trump signaled that the tension between the competing factions of Donald Trump’s crypto empire has cooled and the family’s World Liberty Financial will buy a “substantial’ amount of the memecoin at the center of the dispute.】

item.title: 马斯克与特朗普分手暴露了华尔街 "备忘录赌场 "的裂缝
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的大分裂只用了不到一天的时间，就重塑了关于亿万富翁在美国资本主义中的权力和影响力的辩论。【原文：It took less than a day for the great Donald Trump-Elon Musk split to reshape debates over billionaire power and influence in American capitalism.】

item.title: 帕克兰高层支持 Sunoco 公司的交易，并敦促其他公司效仿
item.description: 帕克兰公司（Parkland Corp.）的第一大股东表示，支持加拿大燃料分销商被 Sunoco LP 收购的提议，并称该交易是公司的一个转折点。【原文：The top shareholder in Parkland Corp. said it supports the Canadian fuel distributor’s proposed takeover by Sunoco LP, describing the deal as a turning point for the company.】

item.title: 银行为银湖公司持有的 Altera 股份提供 15 亿美元贷款
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，以巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）为首的一批银行启动了一项15亿美元的贷款销售，以支持银湖管理公司（Silver Lake Management）从英特尔公司收购可编程芯片公司Altera Corp.的多数股权。【原文：A group of banks led by Barclays Plc launched a $1.5 billion loan sale to support Silver Lake Management’s acquisition of a majority stake in programmable chips unit Altera Corp. from Intel Corp., according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 对冲基金在加拿大野火风险中加码看涨石油押注
item.description: 由于野火危及加拿大原油流动，且欧佩克+的增产幅度低于一些人的预期，对冲基金对美国原油的看涨立场达到五个月来的最高点。【原文：Hedge funds boosted their bullish stance on US crude by the most in five months as wildfires endangered Canadian flows and OPEC+ increased production less than some had feared.】

item.title: 哈佛大学在特朗普拨款之争中获得其他大学支持
item.description: 由普林斯顿大学、麻省理工学院、加州理工学院和约翰霍普金斯大学等 18 所美国顶尖研究型大学组成的团体请求联邦法官允许其提交法律论据，支持哈佛大学与特朗普政府就 20 多亿美元被冻结的拨款进行高风险对决。【原文：A group of 18 leading US research universities, including Princeton, MIT, Caltech and Johns Hopkins, asked a federal judge for permission to file legal arguments in support of Harvard University in its high-stakes showdown with the Trump administration over more than $2 billion in frozen grant money.】

item.title: Perplexity、谷歌打赌网络浏览器是人工智能的新领域
item.description: 科技公司正在重新思考人工智能时代的网络浏览器。但首先...【原文：Tech companies are rethinking web browsers for the AI era. But first…】

item.title: 温克艾沃斯双胞胎的双子座公司向美国证券交易委员会提交首次公开募股机密文件
item.description: 在稳定币发行商 Circle Internet Group Inc. 疯狂上市之后，由亿万富翁温克莱沃斯双胞胎支持的加密货币交易所平台 Gemini 已申请上市。【原文：Gemini, a cryptocurrency exchange platform backed by the billionaire Winklevoss twins, has filed to go public on the heels of the frenzied debut by stablecoin issuer Circle Internet Group Inc.】

item.title: Gol 航空公司在破产保护后向国际市场进军以降低巴西风险
item.description: 巴西航空公司 Gol Linhas Aéreas Inteligentes SA 首席执行官塞尔索-费雷尔（Celso Ferrer）在接受采访时说，作为促进增长和减少对国内市场依赖的战略的一部分，该公司正在加快国际扩张。【原文：Brazilian airline Gol Linhas Aéreas Inteligentes SA is ramping up international expansion as part of a strategy to boost growth and reduce dependence on its home market after exiting Chapter 11, Chief Executive Officer Celso Ferrer said in an interview.】

item.title: 马斯克的 X 选择 Polymarket 作为预测市场合作伙伴
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克的 X 公司和基于加密货币的预测市场平台 Polymarket 正在合作，向预测平台提供从社交媒体网站上的帖子中获得的数据驱动的见解和建议。【原文：Elon Musk’s X and the cryptocurrency-based predictions market platform Polymarket are partnering to provide data-drive insights and recommendations derived from posts on the social media site to the predictions platform.】

item.title: 特朗普签署命令，在世界杯前加强无人机安全
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周五签署行政命令，加强美国的无人机能力，包括在2026年国际足联世界杯和2028年夏季奥运会等大型体育赛事在美国举办之前加强反无人机工具。【原文：President Donald Trump signed executive orders Friday to boost US drone capabilities, including strengthening counter-drone tools ahead of major sporting events such as the 2026 FIFA World Cup and the 2028 Summer Olympics that will be hosted in the country.】

item.title: 商务部为 430 亿美元宽带计划制定新规则
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）发布了新的指导意见，旨在重塑一项旨在用宽带服务连接全国的大规模互联网基础设施计划，命令各州重新制定最初的覆盖计划，以尽可能低的价格提供服务。【原文：US Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick released new guidance aimed at reshaping a massive internet infrastructure program to connect the entire country with broadband service, ordering states to rework their initial coverage plans to deliver service at the lowest-possible price.】

item.title: 特朗普称习近平将重启稀土贸易并确定会谈日期
item.description: 在两国谈判代表准备于 6 月 9 日在伦敦恢复贸易谈判之际，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他的中国同行习近平已同意重启稀土材料的流通。【原文：President Donald Trump said his Chinese counterpart Xi Jinping had agreed to restart the flow of rare-earth materials, as negotiators from the two nations prepare to resume trade talks on June 9 in London.】

item.title: 美联储任命迈克尔-霍洛维茨为新监察长
item.description: 美国中央银行任命迈克尔-霍洛维茨（Michael E. Horowitz）自 6 月 30 日起担任联邦储备委员会监察长办公室主任。【原文：The US central bank appointed Michael E. Horowitz to head the Federal Reserve Board’s Office of Inspector General starting June 30.】

item.title: 瑞士资本提出要求后，瑞银誓言坚守战略
item.description: 瑞士政府提出了严格的新规定，要求银行持有高达 260 亿美元的新资本，瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）表示不会改变其战略。【原文：UBS Group AG said it won’t change it’s strategy after the Swiss government proposed strict new rules that could see the bank hold up to $26 billion in fresh capital.】

item.title: 特斯拉股价受困于马斯克与特朗普的决裂
item.description: 当唐纳德-特朗普总统在 11 月赢得大选时，投资者将特斯拉公司视为最大的赢家之一。在投资者眼睁睁地看着这个曾经强大的联盟实时解体之后，这个赌注现在似乎已经摇摇欲坠。【原文：When President Donald Trump won the election in November, investors viewed Tesla Inc. as one of the biggest winners. That bet now seems to be on shaky ground after investors watched the once formidable alliance dissolve in real time.】

item.title: 哈克敦促美联储在调整利率前等待更多明确信息
item.description: 费城联邦储备银行行长帕特里克-哈克（Patrick Harker）表示，今年下半年有可能降息，但他反复强调官员们目前应按兵不动，等待不确定性消退。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Philadelphia President Patrick Harker said there’s a potential path to lowering rates in the second half of the year, but repeated officials should stand pat for now and wait for uncertainty to ebb.】

item.title: 根据埃利奥特的银点计划，泰晤士河水务公司需要 100 亿英镑的资金
item.description: 据知情人士透露，包括银点资本（Silver Point Capital）和埃利奥特管理公司（Elliott Management）在内的基金正在为英国公用事业公司泰晤士水务（Thames Water）制定一项总额将超过 100 亿英镑（约合 135 亿美元）的拯救计划。【原文：Funds including Silver Point Capital and Elliott Management are working on a rescue plan for British utility Thames Water that would total more than £10 billion ($13.5 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 破产的金融科技公司 Synapse 要求清算而非重组
item.description: 破产金融科技公司 Synapse Financial Technologies Inc. 的受托人在该金融科技公司未能为其资产找到买家后，要求将其破产保护案件转为清算或完全驳回。【原文：A trustee for bankrupt financial-technology firm Synapse Financial Technologies Inc. has asked to convert its Chapter 11 case into liquidation, or dismiss the matter entirely, after the fintech failed to find a buyer for its assets.】

item.title: 太阳能马赛克计划申请破产，清洁能源困境加剧
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，美国最大的家庭太阳能贷款提供商之一 Solar Mosaic LLC 正计划申请破产，以应对联邦对清洁能源支持的市场不确定性。【原文：Solar Mosaic LLC, one of the largest US providers of home solar loans, is planning to file for bankruptcy in the face of market uncertainty over federal support of clean energy, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 野村认为美日政策压力可能导致日元大幅反弹
item.description: 据野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings, Inc.【原文：Japanese investors pivoting out of US assets as yen yields rise — combined with implicit pressure from Washington over the exchange rate during trade talks — could push the currency about 6% higher against the dollar in the coming months, according to Nomura Holdings, Inc.】
